mil6.1.7:1.1: “Bhante nagasena, idha yo koci gihi parajikam ajjhapanno bhaveyya, so aparena samayena pabbajeyya, attanapi so na janeyya ‘gihiparajikam ajjhapannosmi’ti, napi tassa anno koci acikkheyya ‘gihiparajikam ajjhapannosi’ti.
mil6.1.7:1.2: So ca tathattaya patipajjeyya, api nu tassa dhammabhisamayo bhaveyya”ti?
mil6.1.7:1.5: “Yo tassa hetu dhammabhisamayaya, so tassa samucchinno, tasma dhammabhisamayo na bhavati”ti.
mil6.1.7:2.2: ‘janantassa kukkuccam hoti, kukkucce sati avaranam hoti, avate citte dhammabhisamayo na hoti’ti.
mil6.1.7:2.3: Imassa pana ajanantassa akukkuccajatassa santacittassa viharato kena karanena dhammabhisamayo na hoti, visamena visameneso panho gacchati, cintetva visajjetha”ti.
mil6.1.7:3.1: “Ruhati, maharaja, sukatthe sukalale mandakhette saradam sukhasayitam bijan”ti?
mil6.1.7:3.3: “Api nu, maharaja, tanneva bijam ghanaselasilatale ruheyya”ti?
mil6.1.7:3.5: “Kissa pana, maharaja, tanneva bijam kalale ruhati, kissa ghanasele na ruhati”ti?
mil6.1.7:3.6: “Natthi, bhante, tassa bijassa ruhanaya ghanasele hetu, ahetuna bijam na ruhati”ti.
mil6.1.7:3.7: “Evameva kho, maharaja, yena hetuna tassa dhammabhisamayo bhaveyya, so tassa hetu samucchinno, ahetuna dhammabhisamayo na hoti.
mil6.1.7:4.1: Yatha va pana, maharaja, dandaleddulagulamuggara pathaviya thanamupagacchanti, api nu, maharaja, teyeva dandaleddulagulamuggara gagane thanamupagacchanti”ti?
mil6.1.7:4.3: “Kim panettha, maharaja, karanam, yena karanena teyeva dandaleddulagulamuggara pathaviya thanamupagacchanti, kena karanena gagane na titthanti”ti?
mil6.1.7:4.4: “Natthi, bhante, tesam dandaleddulagulamuggaranam patitthanaya akase hetu, ahetuna na titthanti”ti.
mil6.1.7:4.5: “Evameva kho, maharaja, tassa tena dosena abhisamayahetu samucchinno, hetusamugghate ahetuna abhisamayo na hotiti.
mil6.1.7:5.1: Yatha va pana, maharaja, thale aggi jalati, api nu kho, maharaja, soyeva aggi udake jalati”ti?
mil6.1.7:5.3: “Kim panettha, maharaja, karanam, yena karanena soyeva aggi thale jalati, kena karanena udake na jalati”ti?
mil6.1.7:5.4: “Natthi, bhante, aggissa jalanaya udake hetu, ahetuna na jalati”ti.
mil6.1.7:5.5: “Evameva kho, maharaja, tassa tena dosena abhisamayahetu samucchinno, hetusamugghate ahetuna dhammabhisamayo na hoti”ti.
mil6.1.7:6.1: “Bhante nagasena, punapetam attham cintehi, na me tattha cittasannatti bhavati, ajanantassa asati kukkucce avaranam hotiti, karanena mam sannapehi”ti.
mil6.1.7:6.2: “Api nu, maharaja, visam halahalam ajanantena khayitam jivitam harati”ti?
mil6.1.7:6.4: “Evameva kho, maharaja, ajanantenapi katam papam abhisamayantarayakaram hoti.
mil6.1.7:7.1: Api nu, maharaja, aggi ajanitva akkamantam dahati”ti?
mil6.1.7:7.3: “Evameva kho, maharaja, ajanantenapi katam papam abhisamayantarayakaram hoti.
mil6.1.7:8.1: Api nu, maharaja, ajanantam asiviso damsitva jivitam harati”ti?
mil6.1.7:8.3: “Evameva kho, maharaja, ajanantenapi katam papam abhisamayantarayakaram hoti.
mil6.1.7:9.1: Nanu, maharaja, kalingaraja samanakolanno sattaratanaparikinno hatthiratanamabhiruyha kuladassanaya gacchanto ajanantopi nasakkhi bodhimandassa uparito gantum, idamettha, maharaja, karanam, yena karanena ajanantenapi katam papam abhisamayantarayakaram hoti”ti?
mil6.1.7:9.2: “Jinabhasitam, bhante nagasena, karanam na sakka patikkositum, esovetassa attho tatha sampaticchami”ti.
